<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>cancel_request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
    var tor = new Torque();
    var res_body = tor.cancel_request(request.body.data);
    response.setContentType('application/json');
    response.setStatus(200);
    writer.writeString(JSON.stringify(res_body));

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/ial/torque/cancelrequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/cancelrequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>liorg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-27 20:43:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>bafb71521bbd2510409d11761a4bcb04</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cancel_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_bafb71521bbd2510409d11761a4bcb04</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>liorg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-19 09:27:47</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Torque">1a1770961b792510409d11761a4bcb1d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_486738961b792510409d11761a4bcbf0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Torque</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Torque</name><script><![CDATA[var Torque = Class.create();
Torque.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    cancel_request: function(data) {
        var jsonObj = JSON.stringify(data);
        var obj = JSON.parse(jsonObj);
        var number = obj.number.toString();
        var grRequestItem = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
        grRequestItem.addQuery("number", number);
        grRequestItem.query();
        if (grRequestItem.next()) {
            var grRequest = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
            grRequest.addQuery("sys_id", grRequestItem.request);
            grRequest.query();
            if (grRequest.next()) {
                grRequest.request_state = 'closed_cancelled';
                grRequest.stage = 'closed_incomplete';
                grRequest.update();
                var response_body = {
                    "requested_item": grRequestItem.number.toString(),
                    "Error": ""
                };
            }


            return response_body;
        } else {
            var response_body = {
                "requested_item": gr.number.toString(),
                "Error": 'could not find Request Item: ' + gr.number.toString()
            };
            return response_body;
        }



    },
    create_request: function(data) {
        try {
            var jsonObj = JSON.stringify(data);
            var obj = JSON.parse(jsonObj);
            var channel_name, title, description, action_type, entity_type, entity_name, space_name, entity_link, requester_email, owner_email, blueprint_name, environment_name, duration, scheduled_end_time, estimated_cost, original_duration, extend_duration, original_estimated_cost, extend_estimated_cost, request_name;
            channel_name = title = description = action_type = entity_type = entity_name = space_name = entity_link = requester_email = owner_email = blueprint_name = environment_name = duration = scheduled_end_time = estimated_cost = original_duration = extend_duration = original_estimated_cost = extend_estimated_cost = request_name = "";

            if (obj.request_name)
                request_name = obj.request_name.toString();
            if (obj.channel_name)
                channel_name = obj.channel_name.toString();
            if (obj.title)
                title = obj.title.toString();
            if (obj.description)
                description = obj.description.toString(); //description
            if (obj.action_type)
                action_type = obj.action_type.toString();
            if (obj.entity_type)
                entity_type = obj.entity_type.toString();
            if (obj.entity_name)
                entity_name = obj.entity_name.toString();
            if (obj.space_name)
                space_name = obj.space_name.toString();
            if (obj.data.space_name)
                space_name = obj.data.space_name.toString();
            if (obj.entity_link)
                entity_link = obj.entity_link.toString();
            if (obj.requester)
                requester_email = obj.requester.toString();
            if (obj.data.owner_email)
                owner_email = obj.data.owner_email.toString();
            if (obj.data.blueprint_name)
                blueprint_name = obj.data.blueprint_name.toString();
            if (obj.data.environment_name)
                environment_name = obj.data.environment_name.toString();
            if (obj.data.duration)
                duration = this.getduration(obj.data.duration.toString());
            if (obj.data.scheduled_end_time)
                scheduled_end_time = obj.data.scheduled_end_time.toString();
            if (obj.data.estimated_cost)
                estimated_cost = obj.data.estimated_cost.toString();
            scheduled_end_time = scheduled_end_time.replace("T", " ");
            scheduled_end_time = scheduled_end_time.replace("Z", "");

            if (obj.data.original_duration)
                original_duration = this.getduration(obj.data.original_duration.toString());
            if (obj.data.extend_duration)
                extend_duration = this.getduration(obj.data.extend_duration.toString());
            if (obj.data.original_estimated_cost)
                original_estimated_cost = obj.data.original_estimated_cost.toString();
            if (obj.data.extend_estimated_cost)
                extend_estimated_cost = obj.data.extend_estimated_cost.toString();


            var inputs = obj.data.inputs;
            var listValuename = [];
            for (var key in inputs) {
                var value = inputs[key];
                listValuename.push({
                    "input_value": value,
                    "input_name": key
                });
            }
            var requester = this.get(requester_email);
            var number = "";
            var cartId = GlideGuid.generate(null);
            var cart = new Cart(cartId);
            var item = cart.addItem('ded0725adba961508b521c7913961966'); //quali request
            cart.setVariable(item, 'request_name', request_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'action_type', action_type);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'entity_type', entity_type);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'channel', channel_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'entity_name', entity_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'entity_link', entity_link);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'request_title', title);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'description', description);
            if (requester != "")
                cart.setVariable(item, 'requester', requester);
            else
                cart.setVariable(item, 'requester_str', requester_email);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'space', space_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'owner_email', owner_email);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'blueprint', blueprint_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'environment', environment_name);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'duration', duration);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'scheduled_end_time', scheduled_end_time);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'estimated_cost', estimated_cost);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'original_duration', original_duration);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'extended_duration', extend_duration);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'original_estimated_cost', original_estimated_cost);
            cart.setVariable(item, 'extended_estimated_cost', extend_estimated_cost);
            var rc = cart.placeOrder();
            var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
            gr.addQuery("request", rc.sys_id);
            gr.query();
            if (gr.next()) {
                gr.variables.inputs = JSON.stringify(listValuename);
                gr.update();
                number = gr.number;

            }

            var response_body = {
                "requested_item": number.toString(),
                "Error": ""
            };
        } catch (ex) {
            var message = ex.message;
            var response_body = {
                "requested_item": "",
                "Error": message
            };

        }
        return response_body;

    },
    getduration: function(durationstr) {

        var durationRegExp = /^P(?:\d+D)?T?(\d+H)?(\d+M)?(\d+S)?$/;
        var durationMatches = durationstr.match(durationRegExp);

        var hours = durationMatches[1] ? durationMatches[1].replace('H', '') : '00';
        var minutes = durationMatches[2] ? durationMatches[2].replace('M', '') : '00';
        var seconds = durationMatches[3] ? durationMatches[3].replace('S', '') : '00';
        if (hours.length === 1) hours = '0' + hours;
        if (minutes.length === 1) minutes = '0' + minutes;
        if (seconds.length === 1) seconds = '0' + seconds;

        var formattedDuration = hours + ':' + minutes + ':' + seconds;
        return formattedDuration;

    },
    get: function(email) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        gr.addQuery("email", email);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            return gr.sys_id;
        } else
            return "";

    },

    type: 'Torque'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>liorg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-27 15:44:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>486738961b792510409d11761a4bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Torque</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_486738961b792510409d11761a4bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>liorg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-20 12:32:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
